name: places/ChIJH2iACIL3wokRVQKuI2b81W0
formattedAddress: 1735 Madison Ave #1B, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1735 Madison Ave #1B, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: I purchased a shower curtain November 2018. It never came. They gave me all kinds of excuses as to why it hadn't arrived. I emailed back and fourth with several ladies from this company. But they never resolved the issue. No refund or shower curtain. I wrote to the BBB and filed a complaint a few months ago. I finally received a refund last week. I know I sent about 50 emails over the course of 2 yrs regarding a refund. The CEO emailed me about my refund and provided a coupon code. I did receive my refund so I tried to use the code and it doesn't even work!!!! This company is a horrible. I would not suggest this company to anyone. KEEP YOUR MONEY....... DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!!! Fraud. Fraud. Fraud. Fraud!!!!!!!!

originalText.text: UNPROFESSIONAL! Six weeks ago I ordered a shower curtain for $22.83 only because it looked gorgeous and wanted to support. The alleged location is literally 45 minutes away and I have not received my item after sending 4 emails and DM messages on social media. I was given a fake tracking number. I received an email asking me to be patient with her.  I went to the website, after putting in my email and tracking number, I found that the item has not left her location to date.  If you are experiencing this issue CALL YOUR BANK to file an investigation. You will receive your refund that way.

originalText.text: DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY. What they are advertising on their site is NOT what you will receive. You will wait a long time to receive your order and when you finally get what you paid for, it's a blurry image on a cheap shower curtain, nothing like the clear pictures you see online. When will this company be shut down. They have been scamming people for years!

originalText.text: Do your research before spending your money online. This company is fraudulent, I never received my items and they will not respond to my request for a tracking number or refund. I only get the same generic response as everyone else. I payed by PayPal, so I hope they get my money back for me. It’s a shame when you try to support a business that you think is black owned and it turns out to be a group of c*nts using us for selfish gain.

originalText.text: I ordered a Bath Mat on February 1st, I received an email on the 17th with a tracking number that doesn't work on the website, I have emailed countless times, and have not received any responses, inspite the fact that they claim you will get a response within 24 hours.  This is not a legitimate service or business.  Buyer beware!
